info.title: Security Audit Log services
info.description: You can use the audit log data to integrate them into your Security Information and Event Management solution (SIEM) to detect security-relevant event situations.

x-sap-shortText: This service enables you to retrieve the Security Audit Log data

values.text: Security Information and Event Management Integration (SAP_COM_0750)

tags.name: SIEM API for Security Audit Log

get.description: A service group contains services belonging to the same business object model and so it shares similar environment conditions. This means the configuration and administration of a service group apply to all services in a service group, that is, routing, authorization, and so on, so you only have to do them once. This method can be used to get security audit logs for this service group
tags: SIEM API for Security Audit Log

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionfilter)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionorderby)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

parameters.name: log_tstmp
parameters.description: UTC Time Stamp in Long Form (YYYYMMDDhhmmssmmmuuun)

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: ABAP System Field: Name of SAP System

get.summary: Get entity from SecurityAuditLog by key
get.description: The configuration and administration of a service group includes routing, authorization and similar details. This method can be used with parameters to filter out security audit information
tags: SIEM API for Security Audit Log

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

GET SecurityAuditLog HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--
